document.full_text: egypt's pope shenouda, head of the orthodox coptic church, called on christians to abandon a demonstration against attacks on their community after a clash overnight left 78 wounded.
document.title: egyptian church calls on copts to abandon protest
lines_and_colors: egypt's pope shenouda, head of the orthodox coptic church, called on christians to abandon a demonstration against attacks on their community after a clash overnight left 78 wounded.
